title: iMovie 10.0.4 Edit and makes Movies (Mac OSX)

If you have an iPhone or iPad, not to mention a camcorder or digital camera, you probably have a lot of great video. And when you want to do something with it, iMovie gets you right into the action. All your clips are organized in one place Ã¢â‚¬â€ where theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re easy to browse, fun to watch, and ready to be made into the next great movie or trailer.

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never been easier to make it in the movies. Just choose the clips you want to use. Insert titles, add effects, and create a full soundtrack with powerful tools that are as easy as drag and drop. And that, ladies and gentlemen, is a wrap.

They appear as a beautiful display of movie posters, so youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll always be the star of the show. And with iCloud, theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re automatically on all your devices, even your Apple TV.
